name: Cannibal Island: Survival
description:
It was a dark and stormy night when the helicopter had to make an emergency landing on an isolated island. Unfortunately for them, fate had a cruel twist in store. As the storm progressed, the chopper was violently tossed and turned until it landed on an isolated island shrouded in mystery.

You will have to make a distress signal but this will surely attract the cannibals to you.

- Build a safe place using natural resources such as wood and minerals

- Loot re-spawns after some time, so make sure you make some runs through the map

- Find and create guns and weapons

- Hunt animals for food and crafting materials

- Find a way out of the island
